headline: Scarred but Resilient, a Uighur Town Clings to Its Cultural Past
abstract: An ancient Muslim town, Yarkand is a cultural cradle for the Uighurs, who have experienced mass detentions. A rare visit revealed how people there have endured the upheavals.
lead_paragraph: YARKAND, China â€” The winding, crowded lanes of old Yarkand, an ancient Silk Road town, preserve patterns of life that go back centuries.
